DOC.brief_summary: To investigate if there are detectable changes in volume and circulation in breasts of healthy volunteers using toremifene 20 mg in luteal phase of the menstruation cycle versus nonmedicated cycle.
DOC.brief_title: Changes in Breast 3D Ultrasound Measurements Using Toremifene
DOC.detailed_description: 20 women were participated to this trial.
DOC.criteria: age 2545 healthy person regular menstrual cycles safe contraception(for example sterilization or condom) gynecological or other type of cancer hormonal contraception pregnancy
